name: Last Stop <3
description:
A game made for the Fall 2021 Scarlet Game Jam.

You are a brand new Rutgers student on campus. So far, you're enjoying your first day except for one thing: there are no buses! Well... there ARE buses... just not in the way that you think. And they're cute. And they like you????

The ultimate Rutgers Bus Dating Sim: Last Stop <3

(this is a massive shitpost please take this with a grain of salt)

credits (nobody wanted their actual name attached to this. for good reason.):

programming: cynpai, sarah

art: atlinx, tankakuka
